data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Kilifi, Kenya.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kilifi, Kenya

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 550,458 believers in Kilifi that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary: On average, 21 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kilifi, Kenya.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, let those from the 550,458 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 550,458 believers in Kilifi to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Marathi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Kilifi, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Kilifi, Kenya will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Kilifi to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

location.name: Kilifi
location.people_groups_list: Somali, Munyoyaya, Chinese, general, Nubian, Sindhi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Somali (3,050,000), Munyoyaya (2,100), Chinese, general (35,000), Nubian (20,000), Sindhi (3,300)
